title: Trackpad LoL
body:
I am level 30, have been for half a year now, and was thinking about starting to play with a mouse.
YES, I am a mac air gamer that plays with trackpad, chill.
I have a perfect 50-50 winrate in soloQ and usually do quite well, however people seem to think that paying with a trackpad is impossible{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 
I have gotten 3 pentas, don't play ranked because of toxidity and am still looking for a main, however I am probably maining shen right now, you could say..

I just wanted your opinion:
Can you play with Trackpad or is mouse neccesary?

replies.body: Probiers doch einfach mal und entscheid selber mit was es besser geht{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
